snippet.title: Saint Seiya Brave Soldiers - PS3 - Sanctuary Arc (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Saint Seiya Brave Soldiers will feature more than 50 Playable characters to battle along the 3 arcs from the original manga including Sanctuary, Poseidon and Hades.
This trailer's spotlight is on the Sanctuary arc -with some surprises- but also include epic moments from Poseidon and Hades arcs.

Saint Seiya Brave Soldiers' Collector edition will include the exclusive Saint Cloth Myth EX Pegasus Seiya (New Bronze Cloth) - Original Color only available with the game in Europe; this 18 cm figurine is part of the Myth Cloth Ex Edition.

Be sure to visit http://www.saintseiya-bravesoldiers.com or your local Namco Bandai website at  http://www.namcobandaigames.eu for further details

Saint Seiya Brave Soldiers is coming out November 2013 on Playstation 3.

Like us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/namcobandaigames.europe
Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
